Cancun - A Great Gay & Lesbian Destination
​​
A tropical oasis at the far northeastern tip of the Yucatan Peninsula of Mexico, Cancun offers any fun-lover or sun-worshipper a vacation they will want to relive over and over again. Cancun is known for fabulous hotels stretching for miles along its white sand beaches, fantastic restaurants, exciting shopping, history, culture, and a great nightlife that lasts until dawn. And let's not forget everything else that is so close – Chichen Itza, Tulum, Isla Mujeres, and Cozumel.

This oasis for couples lies along the coast overlooking the turquoise Caribbean Sea. A stunning coast line serves as a dramatic backdrop for this recently renovated resort featuring 252 richly appointed guestrooms. Five restaurants and three bars cater to a full range of tastes and moods. Golf enthusiasts can play all year round at the nearby Riviera Cancun and Moon Spa & Golf Club which house the only Jack Nicklaus Signature golf courses in Cancun. Expert hands deliver spa services to those who seek a serene and rejuvenating experience.
Weddings & Honeymoons Mexico

I’m the place where love comes to stay, where
vows are exchanged between lovingly committed LGBT couples.
Here in the tropical paradise of Cancun the brilliant sunshine
shimmers on the turquoise colored sea, to create the ideal setting for
a picture-perfect wedding. Casual or traditional, big or small: I have
everything your hearts desire, and I’ll make sure your wedding day is
the unforgettable start of a beautiful journey together”
​​
Getting married in paradise is as simple and beautiful
as it looks when you choose Oasis.
Our Atlanta-based staff is ready to take care of every detail,
putting you in touch with your designated bi-lingual wedding
expert on-site in Cancun and simplifying the process.
We’re delighted to be the choice of
LGBT couples who want their wedding
to be a unique expression of freedom
and love. Booking is easy, and we are
there to help you make your wedding
day perfect. Whether you’re looking for
a small, intimate exchange of vows or a
lavish wedding with family and friends,
Oasis has a great selection of packages
– and upgrades – to choose from.


LGBTQ Oasis Resort Mexico

OASIS SENS CONCEPT

O yes – I'm sexy, sensuous… an adults-only resort that's romantic, relaxing and a little risqué. Warm and inviting, I welcome my friends from the LGBTQ community. Follow your bliss and learn my secrets – from my foodie-friendly gourmet dining experience to my exclusive Sian Ka'an preserve, a true Shangri-La, a lost paradise on earth.

FEEL FREE TO FEEL GOOD
www.gay-travels.biz         #gayweddings #gayhoneymoon
